title: Schrödinger’s Book
author: VD
content_html:
RK writes to inform us of a tale of two emails:

I got two EMails from Amazon today.

1. My order was cancelled for not acknowledging the delay. (Which I was never asked about).

2. My book was shipped.

Wonder what happens next?

Does RK’s book exist or not? The question is beyond my ability to answer, perhaps a Dark Vaporist could utilize his miraculous powers of observation to let us know.
content_text:
RK writes to inform us of a tale of two emails:
I got two EMails from Amazon today.
1. My order was cancelled for not acknowledging the delay. (Which I was never asked about).
2.   My book was shipped.
Wonder what happens next?
Does RK’s book exist or not?  The question is beyond my ability to answer, perhaps a Dark Vaporist could utilize his miraculous powers of observation to let us know.
